text: Mezhdu lyud'mi yest' takiye, kotoryye sluzhat Bogu, kak by stoya na chem libo ostrokonechnom: yesli s nimi byvayet chto dobroye, oni pri nem spokoyny; a yesli s nimi byvayet chto bedstvennoye, oni sovershenno izmenyayutsya: oni neschastny i v nastoyashchey zhizni i v budushchey; eto yest' ochevidnoye neschastiye
